capabilities.name: Agent Mode
capabilities.description: Agentic coding tool that autonomously reads codebase, edits files, runs commands, and self-corrects. Plans approach, implements across multiple files, verifies results.

sources.description: Claude Code overview - agentic coding tool capabilities
Claude Code changelog - agent mode updates and improvements

capabilities.name: Sub-agents
capabilities.description: Spawn multiple Claude Code agents to work on different parts of a task simultaneously. A lead agent coordinates work, assigns subtasks, and merges results.

sources.description: Claude Code overview - sub-agent orchestration for parallel task execution
Claude Code changelog - sub-agent feature releases

capabilities.name: Code Generation
capabilities.description: Generate code in multiple programming languages from natural language descriptions, including full feature implementations across multiple files

sources.description: Claude Code overview - code generation from natural language

capabilities.name: Code Explanation
capabilities.description: Analyze and explain existing code, trace through complex logic, understand entire codebases

sources.description: Claude Code overview - code analysis and explanation capabilities

capabilities.name: Debugging
capabilities.description: Trace bugs through codebase, identify root causes, and implement fixes. Can run tests and verify fixes work.

sources.description: Claude Code overview - debugging with test execution and fix verification

capabilities.name: Code Refactoring
capabilities.description: Refactor code across multiple files with coordinated changes

sources.description: Claude Code overview - multi-file refactoring capabilities

capabilities.name: Test Generation
capabilities.description: Generate tests, run them, and fix failures iteratively

sources.description: Claude Code overview - test generation with iterative fixing

capabilities.name: Documentation Generation
capabilities.description: Generate code documentation, README files, and API documentation

sources.description: Claude Code overview - documentation generation capabilities

capabilities.name: Chat Assistance
capabilities.description: Interactive conversational coding assistance with full codebase context

sources.description: Claude Code overview - interactive conversational coding assistance

capabilities.name: Multi-file Editing
capabilities.description: Direct file creation, editing, and deletion across entire projects with coordinated changes

sources.description: Claude Code overview - direct file creation and editing across projects

capabilities.name: Terminal CLI
capabilities.description: Full-featured CLI for working directly in your terminal. Runs shell commands, manages git, executes build pipelines.

sources.description: Claude Code overview - full-featured CLI for terminal-based development
Claude Code changelog - CLI feature updates

capabilities.name: Context Window
capabilities.description: 200K token context window (1M in beta) with automatic context management across codebase exploration

sources.description: Claude Code overview - context window management
Anthropic model documentation - context window specifications

capabilities.name: Custom Context Files
capabilities.description: CLAUDE.md files for project-specific coding standards, architecture decisions, preferred libraries, and review checklists

sources.description: Claude Code overview - CLAUDE.md project-specific context files

capabilities.name: MCP Support
capabilities.description: Model Context Protocol integration for connecting to external tools - Jira, Slack, Google Drive, databases, and custom tooling

sources.description: Claude Code MCP integration tutorial - connecting external tools
Claude Code overview - Model Context Protocol support

capabilities.name: Custom Instructions
capabilities.description: Custom slash commands (skills) for reusable workflows, plus CLAUDE.md files for project-specific coding standards and instructions

sources.description: Claude Code overview - custom slash commands (skills) and CLAUDE.md files

capabilities.name: Git Integration
capabilities.description: Direct git operations: staging, committing, branching, creating PRs. GitHub Actions and GitLab CI/CD integration for automated code review and issue triage.

sources.description: Claude Code overview - git operations and CI/CD integration

capabilities.name: Multi-language Support
capabilities.description: Support for all major programming languages

sources.description: Claude Code overview - multi-language programming support

capabilities.name: Security Analysis
capabilities.description: Identify security vulnerabilities and suggest secure coding practices

sources.description: Claude Code overview - security vulnerability identification

capabilities.name: Extended Thinking
capabilities.description: Extended thinking mode for complex reasoning tasks, architecture decisions, and multi-step problem solving

sources.description: Claude Code overview - extended thinking mode for complex reasoning
Anthropic model documentation - extended thinking capabilities

capabilities.name: Vision
capabilities.description: Analyze images including code screenshots, diagrams, wireframes, and error messages

sources.description: Claude Code overview - image analysis capabilities
Anthropic model documentation - vision capabilities

capabilities.name: Prompt and Context Inspector
capabilities.description: /context visualizes current context usage as a colored grid. /compact manages context size with optional focus instructions. Status line (configurable via /statusline) displays context window usage continuously. CLAUDE.md content visible as project context.

sources.description: Claude Code overview - /context, /compact, and /statusline commands
Claude Code changelog - context inspection feature updates

capabilities.name: Debug Logging
capabilities.description: --debug flag with category filtering (e.g. 'api,hooks', 'api,mcp', '!statsig'). --verbose for full turn-by-turn output (Ctrl+O toggle in session). /debug reads session debug log. /doctor checks installation health: MCP server errors, settings validation, keybinding issues, context warnings. MCP servers debuggable via 'claude mcp list/get' and /mcp. OpenTelemetry (OTLP) metric export via OTEL_METRICS_EXPORTER.

sources.description: Claude Code overview - --debug flag, /debug, /doctor commands
Claude Code changelog - debugging feature updates

capabilities.name: Usage Tracking
capabilities.description: /cost shows total cost ($), API duration, wall duration, and code changes (lines added/removed). /stats shows daily usage, session history, streaks, and model preferences. /usage shows subscription plan limits and rate limit status. /export saves conversation to file or clipboard with JSON and stream-JSON output formats for programmatic analysis.

sources.description: Claude Code overview - /cost, /stats, /usage, /export commands
Claude Code changelog - usage tracking feature updates

capabilities.name: Lifecycle Hooks
capabilities.description: Eight hook events (PreToolUse, PostToolUse, SessionStart, Stop, SubagentStart, SubagentStop, PreCompact, UserPromptSubmit) run shell commands at agent lifecycle points. PreToolUse supports allow/deny/modify with tool name matchers. Configured in .claude/settings.json or .claude/settings.local.json. Hooks receive JSON on stdin and return decisions on stdout.

sources.description: Claude Code overview - eight hook events configured in .claude/settings.json
Claude Code changelog - lifecycle hooks feature releases

models.name: Claude Opus 4.6
models.note: Most intelligent, recommended for complex tasks
